caption:
Budtenders do more than sell.  They hold the power at the point of sale to educate, guide, and shape the customer experience.

In a new industry like cannabis, knowledge is a potent advantage. If your dispensary doesn’t have a budtender training program, now might be the time to invest in a Head of Education and Development, like @dazedcanna 

When your team understands what makes cannabis high quality and can confidently explain product value, they help customers make more informed choices, reduce stigma, and promote a more nuanced cannabis consumption experience.
